description: UUID primary key for outreach company target record
FK to cl.company_identity - parent hub identity
Current outreach status: not_started, active, paused, completed, do_not_contact
Cached BIT score at time of targeting (0-100)
Timestamp when company was first added to outreach
Timestamp of most recent outreach activity
Number of sequences this company has been through
Origin of this target record (e.g., manual, import, bit_trigger)

OUT.TARGET.FK | Foreign key to outreach.outreach.outreach_id.
This is the ONLY FK sub-hubs use. They do NOT directly access sovereign_id.
